text: Arhopala argentea, is a butterfly in the family Lycaenidae. It was described by Otto Staudinger in 1888. It is found in the Indomalayan realm where it is found in Celebes and the Philippines.Seitz, A., 1912-1927. Die Indo-Australien Tagfalter Grossschmetterlinge Erde 9 ==Subspecies== Arhopala argentea verityae holotype, in the Natural History Museum, London *A. a. argentea Celebes *A. a. boordi Tennent & Rawlins, 2010 *A. a. verityae Tennent & Rawlins, 2010 ==References== ==External links== *Arhopala Boisduval, 1832 at Markku Savela's Lepidoptera and Some Other Life Forms. Retrieved June 3, 2017. Category:Arhopala Category:Butterflies described in 1888
title: Arhopala argentea
